definition: son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: It goes after oxygen because it is small.
sentences.chinese: 它在氧原子之後，因爲它很小。

sentences.english: As is known to all, water is composed of two hydrogens and one oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 衆所周知，水是由兩個氫原子和一個氧原子構成的。

sentences.english: The last one is coordinated with almost all oxygen atoms.
sentences.chinese: 另一個強結合部位的配位原子可能全是氧原子。

sentences.english: An example of that might be, oh, let's look at something like oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 一個例子可以是，嗯，對，我們看下氧原子。

sentences.english: Two oxygen atoms have similar size of magnetic moment but the opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 兩個氧原子的磁矩大小接近但方向相反。

sentences.english: For the undoped surface, the adsorption of hydrogen results in losing of bridging oxygen.
sentences.chinese: 對於未摻雜表面，吸附氫後，表層橋氧原子將缺失。

sentences.english: Electron-impact excitation of atomic oxygen is of great interest in aeronomy and astrophysics.
sentences.chinese: 電子與氧原子的碰撞有重要的意義。

sentences.english: The catalyst then knits pairs of oxygens together to make O2.
sentences.chinese: 一對氧原子在催化劑上結合使其成爲氧氣分子。

sentences.english: The magnetic moments of the two oxygen atoms have a similar magnitude but acting in opposite direction.
sentences.chinese: 兩個氧原子的磁矩大小接近但方向相反。

sentences.english: Ozone (O3) is an allotropic form of oxygen (O2) with three atoms in each molecule.
sentences.chinese: 氧氣和臭氧都是由氧原子組成。

sentences.english: All K atoms coordinate with O atoms of phenolic hydroxyl group and nitro-group simultaneously.
sentences.chinese: 所有的K離子均同時與酚羥基和硝基的氧原子配位。

sentences.english: Main chain composed of alternating silicon and oxygen atoms in the silicon atoms with organic groups.
sentences.chinese: 主鏈由硅氧原子交替組成，在硅原子上帶有有機基團。

definition: peptide bond CO-NH/bond in protein between carboxyl radical and amino radical
